author: Sarah Jones
title: No Masks, No Hand Sanitizer, Filthy Facilities: A Sick UPS Worker Speaks Out
description: “I didn’t sign up to kill people and that’s what it feels like I’m doing.”
content: Warehouse workers and delivery drivers are carrying the American economy on their backs. Not only has the outbreak of novel coronavirus, or COVID-19, increased their workload, it creates dangerous working conditions that corporations have done little to mitig… [+9915 chars]
